text:
Since they use the same program name now, does anyone have a way to detect if a
person/PC actally has Acrobat or Reader? Like a registry value? I tried
searching but only find old docs about finding the installed version or similar.
Thanks, --
Link: None

metadata.topic: Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader
